Popover_API.summary: The Popover API provides developers with a standard, consistent, flexible mechanism for displaying popover content on top of other page content. Popover content can be controlled either using HTML attributes, or via JavaScript.

Popover_APIUsing.summary: The Popover API provides developers with a standard, consistent, flexible mechanism for displaying popover content on top of other page content. Popover content can be controlled either declaratively using HTML attributes, or via JavaScript. This article provides a detailed guide to using all of its features.
